name: Informative Coding
description: Informative Coding is a non-profit organization that helps to learn technology in Bangla. The purpose of which is to motivate people to learn technology by simply introducing them to technology.

name: Dr. Omar Danoun
description: I have built this website for Dr. Omar Danoun since 14 Feb 2022. As well as I've also built a custom CMS for managing the content and navigation menu of this website. Website and CMS are built with NextJs, as the Database, I've used MySQL, and Sequalize library in CMS. Thanks & regards
